environment_overview:
1) The detected devices include multiple meross Light Strips, which are capable of switching on/off, adjusting brightness (switchLevel), and controlling color temperature and color. The specific devices identified are: one with ID 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298, another with ID 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709, and a third with ID 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d. 2) The current states of the meross Light Strips indicate that all are powered off, with varying brightness levels: one at 70, another at 48, and the last at 35. The color temperatures are set at 2700K, 7000K, and 2300K, respectively. Actionable controls include turning on the lights and adjusting their brightness levels to create a suitable ambiance for dinner. The color temperature can also be modified to achieve a warmer setting, enhancing the dining atmosphere.
